title: Horrific moment blood-smeared son ‘shares his mother’s murder on Facebook Live’
text:
Jeremy Antonio Langford posted horrific Facebook Live videos of himself smeared with blood while allegedly murdering his mother Graciela Holker, far right (Pictures: Facebook)

These stomach-churning video grabs show a 24 year-old man smeared with his late mother’s blood after allegedly killing her on Facebook Live.

Jeffrey Antonio Langford Jr, 24, reportedly shot Graciela Laura Holker, 45, dead at their home in North Salt Lake, Utah, on Saturday night.

He is said to have live-streamed footage of his mother’s corpse with a gunshot wound to her head, but told cops ‘I saw my mom shoot herself in the face,’ when they arrived.

Subsequent forensic tests on the corpse and suspected murder weapon disproved Langford’s suicide claim, according to police.

Langford Jr shared three live videos, which are too disturbing to reproduce, the first of which saw him sob ‘Mom,’ before moving Holker’s bloodied head back into shot.

Holker was shot dead at her apartment complex in North Salt Lake, Utah, pictured, on Saturday night (Picture: ABC4)

He tells viewers that he didn’t kill her and repeats the suicide claim, but then says the woman isn’t dead, and says he needs to finish it, according to court papers.

A second video again repeats the suicide claim, with Langford vowing that he would not be going to jail.

A third clip sees Langford say that his mother deserves a good send-off, and that he lost her the same day he lost his dad. The clips prompted a flood of concerned comments from friends on Langford’s Facebook page.

Langford’s father died years earlier, according to police, with comments on Facebook suggesting he fell victim to a shooting accident.

During a subsequent police interview, Langford claimed he and his mother had been drinking, and that she’d taken a Klonopin sedative pill.

Langford has now been charged with his mother’s first-degree murder (Picture: ABC4)

He offered two different versions of what he claims happened next, saying that Holker had shot herself inside, then claiming she’d killed herself outside, ABC4 reported.

Asked why he hadn’t dialed 911, Langford reportedly claimed he was scared that she would shoot him.

His mother was found with the gun in her right hand.

Langford has now been charged with first-degree felony murder and second-degree felony obstruction of justice, over claims he lied about his mom’s death.

He is further charged with carrying a dangerous weapon while in possession of drugs or alcohol.
description: Jeffrey Langford reportedly murdered Graciela Holker and shared videos of himself smeared in his late mother's blood
